snippet: Firefighters were still battling outbreaks of fire in Valparaíso on Monday, two days after a blaze first swept through the city’s hilltops and destroyed 2,000 homes.
abstract: Chilean firefighters are still battling outbreaks of fire in Valparaiso, Chile, two days after wind-borne flames ravaged the steep hills surrounding the city; at least 15 people have died as a result of the fire.

byline.contributor: Tomás Munita contributed reporting from Valparaíso, Chile.

lead_paragraph: Firefighters were still battling outbreaks of fire in Valparaíso on Monday, two days after a blaze first swept through the city’s hilltops and destroyed 2,000 homes.

headline.main: After Fire, Picturesque Hills of Chilean Port City Are Left in Ruin
headline.print_headline: After Fire, Picturesque Hills of Chilean Port City Are Left in Ruin
